law.catch_line: The General Assembly finds and declares that:...

text.section:
The General Assembly declares that it is the policy of this State to enhance the quality of life for children with developmental disability and their families, to preserve family unity, and to promote family stability by:
Providing essential family support services to assist families in caring for children with developmental disability in the home; and
Diminishing the use of residential placements for children with developmental disability.
